1: -module(stop_SUITE).
    2: -include("public_transport.hrl").
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl"). %% For assertion macros
    5: 
    6: -export([ passenger_check_in_case/1
    7:         , passenger_check_out_case/1
    8:         , vehicle_check_in_case/1
    9:         , vehicle_check_out_case/1
   10:         , invalid_vehicle_check_out_case/1]).
   11: 
   12: -export([ all/0
   13:         , init_per_testcase/2
   14:         , end_per_testcase/2]).
   15: 
   16: 
   17: all() ->
   18:   [ passenger_check_in_case
   19:   , passenger_check_out_case
   20:   , vehicle_check_in_case
   21:   , vehicle_check_out_case
   22:   , invalid_vehicle_check_out_case
   23:   ].
   24: 
   25: 
   26: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
   27:   stop_supervisor:start_link(),
   28:   P1 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p1, strict),
   29:   P2 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p2, strict),
   30:   P3 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p3, strict),
   31:   P4 = gen_server_mock:start(citizen, p4, strict),
   32:   V1 = gen_server_mock:start(vehicle, v1, strict),
   33:   V2 = gen_server_mock:start(vehicle, v2, strict),
   34:   Stop = stop_supervisor:start_stop(stop1),
   35:   Config ++ [ {p1, P1}
   36:             , {p2, P2}
   37:             , {p3, P3}
   38:             , {p4, P4}
   39:             , {v1, V1}
   40:             , {v2, V2}
   41:             , {stop, Stop}
   42:             ].
   43: 
   44: 
   45: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   46:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   47:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   48:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   49:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
   50:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
   51:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
   52:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   53:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P1)),
   54:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P2)),
   55:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P3)),
   56:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(P4)),
   57:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V1)),
   58:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V2)),
   59:   gen_server_mock:stop(P1),
   60:   gen_server_mock:stop(P2),
   61:   gen_server_mock:stop(P3),
   62:   gen_server_mock:stop(P4),
   63:   gen_server_mock:stop(V1),
   64:   gen_server_mock:stop(V2),
   65:   stop_supervisor:stop_stop(Stop),
   66:   Config.
   67: 
   68: 
   69: passenger_check_in_case(Config) ->
   70:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   71:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   72:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   73:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   74:   
   75:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   76:   ?assertMatch({nok, _}, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   77:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
   78:   ?assertMatch(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)).
   79: 
   80: passenger_check_out_case(Config) ->
   81:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
   82:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
   83:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
   84:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
   85:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
   86:   
   87:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
   88:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
   89:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
   90: 
   91:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 3, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
   92:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
   93:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
   94:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
   95: 
   96:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
   97: 
   98:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
   99:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P2, false),
  100:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P3, true).
  101: 
  102: vehicle_check_in_case(Config) ->
  103:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  104:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  105:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  106:   P4 = ?config(p4, Config),
  107:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  108:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  109:   
  110:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  111:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
  112: 
  113:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 1, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  114:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  115:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, false),
  116: 
  117:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  118: 
  119:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  120:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P4, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, false),
  121:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?INCREMENT_BOARDING_PASSENGER, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  122:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
  123:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P4)).
  124: 
  125: vehicle_check_out_case(Config) ->
  126:   P1 = ?config(p1, Config),
  127:   P2 = ?config(p2, Config),
  128:   P3 = ?config(p3, Config),
  129:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  130:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
  131:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  132:   
  133:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  134:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
  135: 
  136:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P1)),
  137:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P2)),
  138:   ?assertEqual(ok, stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_IN(Stop, P3)),
  139: 
  140:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 3, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  141:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P1, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  142:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P2, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  143:   gen_server_mock:expect_call(P3, {vehicle_checked_in, V1}, true),
  144: 
  145:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  146:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V2, true),
  147: 
  148:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P1, false),
  149:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P2, false),
  150: 
  151:   ?assert(gen_server_mock:validate(V2)), %% Validate that the checkin_ok has not been sent prematurely
  152:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V2, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 0, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  153: 
  154:   stop:?PASSENGER_CHECK_OUT(Stop, P3, true),
  155:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V1, true),
  156:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V2, true). %% Exercise check out when no vehicles queued
  157: 
  158: invalid_vehicle_check_out_case(Config) ->
  159:   V1 = ?config(v1, Config),
  160:   V2 = ?config(v2, Config),
  161:   Stop = ?config(stop, Config),
  162: 
  163:   gen_server_mock:expect_cast(V1, {?CHECKIN_OK, Stop, 0, false, gen_server_utils:extract_pid(Stop)}),
  164: 
  165:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_IN(Stop, V1, true),
  166:   stop:?VEHICLE_CHECK_OUT(Stop, V2, true).
